thread.title: Tom Brady's dad blasts Roger Goodell for 'witch hunt'
thread.title_full: Tom Brady's dad blasts Roger Goodell for 'witch hunt' | Boston Herald

author: Adam Kurkjian
title: Tom Brady's dad blasts Roger Goodell for 'witch hunt'
text:
Tom Brady's dad blasts Roger Goodell for 'witch hunt' Adam Kurkjian Saturday, January 28, 2017 Credit: The Associated Press Tom Brady/File comments This week, Tom Brady has downplayed any belief that winning Super Bowl LI will act as some sort of vengeance against the league and commissioner Roger Goodell, who helped bring about a four-game Deflategate suspension on the Patriots quarterback this season.
Tom Brady Sr. isn’t being as diplomatic.
The elder Brady ripped Goodell in an exclusive interview with Bay Area television station KRON.
“(Goodell) went on a witch hunt and went in way over his head and had to lie his way out in numerous ways and the reality is that Tommy never got suspended for deflating footballs,” Brady Sr. said last night. “He got suspended because the court said that he could, Roger Goodell could do anything he wanted to do to any player for any reason whatsoever. That’s what happened. The NFL admitted they had no evidence on him.”
Earlier this week, Goodell went on “The Herd with Colin Cowherd” radio show and said potentially handing Brady a fifth Lombardi trophy would be “an honor.”
Brady Sr. agreed and added a shot at the commissioner while doing so.
“It should be an honor because somebody that has Roger Goodell’s ethics doesn’t belong on any stage that Tom Brady is on,” Brady Sr. said.
